title: Does playing Ranked Flex removes the Solo rank decay?
body:
Lets say I havent played solo rank for over 30 days and start getting my solo rank decays.
Does playing flex rank stops the solo rank decay too? or it only stops the decay of flex?

replies.body: Playing flex would not count towards stopping any other queue's decay. Those ranks and queues are separate, so you'll need to play Solo to stop any Solo decay.
